question: Indo-Japan air drill exercise “Shinyuu Maitri” has started in which state?
explanation: In West Bengal, the joint military exercise \'Shinyuu Maitri\' between Indian Air Force (IAF) and Japanese Air Self Defence Force (JASDF) has started at Air Force Station - Arjan Singh in Panagarh town from October 17 to 23. The focus of the exercise will be to undertake Joint Mobility and Tactical (JMT) interoperability among the two forces.
